autoContrast.description: Determines whether text color with filled variant should depend on background-color. If luminosity of the color prop is less than theme.luminosityThreshold, then theme.white will be used for text color, otherwise theme.black. Overrides theme.autoContrast.
autoContrast.description_zh: 确定具有 filled 变体的文本颜色是否应取决于 background-color。如果 color 属性的亮度小于 theme.luminosityThreshold，则 theme.white 将用于文本颜色，否则使用 theme.black。覆盖 theme.autoContrast。

circle.description: If set, badge min-width becomes equal to its height and horizontal padding is removed
circle.description_zh: 如果设置，则 badge min-width 将等于其高度，并删除水平填充

color.description: Key of theme.colors or any valid CSS color, theme.primaryColor by default
color.description_zh: theme.colors 的键或任何有效的 CSS 颜色，默认为 theme.primaryColor

fullWidth.description: Determines whether Badge should take 100% of its parent width, false by default
fullWidth.description_zh: 确定 Badge 是否应采用其父级宽度的 100%，默认为 false

gradient.description: Gradient configuration used when variant="gradient", default value is theme.defaultGradient
gradient.description_zh: variant=“gradient” 时使用的渐变配置，默认值为 theme.defaultGradient

leftSection.description: Content displayed on the left side of the badge label
leftSection.description_zh: 徽章标签左侧显示的内容

radius.description: Key of theme.radius or any valid CSS value to set border-radius, 'xl' by default
radius.description_zh: theme.radius 的键或任何有效的 CSS 值，默认设置 border-radius，'xl'

rightSection.description: Content displayed on the right side of the badge label
rightSection.description_zh: 徽章标签右侧显示的内容

size.description: Controls font-size, height and horizontal padding, 'md' by default
size.description_zh: 控制字体大小、高度和水平填充，默认为 'md'
